workflow_node.unsaved_changes.confirm: You have unsaved changes. Do you really want to close the panel and drop those changes?
workflow_node.start.label: Start
workflow_node.start.form.trigger.label: Trigger
workflow_node.start.form.trigger.tooltip:
Auto: Time triggered based on cron expression.
Manual: Manually triggered.
workflow_node.start.form.trigger_cron.er: Please enter a valid cron expression
workflow_node.start.form.trigger_cron.to: Exactly 5 space separated segments. Time zone is based on the server.
workflow_node.start.form.trigger_cron.ex: Expected execution time for the last 5 times:
workflow_node.start.form.trigger_cron.gu:
Tips: If you have multiple workflows, it is recommended to set them to run at multiple times of the day instead of always running at specific times. Don't always set it to midnight every day to avoid spikes in traffic.

Reference links:
1. Let’s Encrypt rate limits
2. Why should my Let’s Encrypt (ACME) client run at a random time?

workflow_node.apply.form.provider_access: Please select an credential of DNS provider
Used to manage DNS records during ACME DNS-01 challenge.
workflow_node.apply.form.aliyun_esa_regi: Please enter Alibaba Cloud ESA region (e.g. cn-hangzhou)
workflow_node.apply.form.aws_route53_reg: Please enter AWS Route53 region (e.g. us-east-1)
workflow_node.apply.form.aws_route53_hos: Please enter AWS Route53 hosted zone ID

workflow_node.apply.form.jdcloud_dns_reg: Please enter JD Cloud DNS region ID (e.g. cn-north-1)
workflow_node.apply.form.tencentcloud_eo: Please enter Tencent Cloud EdgeOne zone ID
workflow_node.apply.form.ca_provider_acc: Please select an credential of the certificate authority
workflow_node.apply.form.nameservers.pla: Please enter DNS recursive nameservers (separated by semicolons)
workflow_node.apply.form.nameservers.too: It determines whether to custom DNS recursive nameservers during ACME DNS-01 challenge. If you don't understand this option, just keep it by default. Learn more.
workflow_node.apply.form.dns_propagation: Please enter DNS propagation waiting time
It determines the waiting time for DNS propagation during ACME DNS-01 challenge. If you don't understand this option, just keep it by default.
Please enter DNS propagation checks timeout

It determines the timeout for DNS propagation checks during ACME DNS-01 challenge. If you don't understand this option, just keep it by default.

Leave it blank to use the default value provided by the provider.
workflow_node.apply.form.dns_ttl.label: DNS TTL (Optional)
workflow_node.apply.form.dns_ttl.tooltip:
It determines the TTL for DNS record during ACME DNS-01 challenge. If you don't understand this option, just keep it by default.

Leave it blank to use the default value provided by the provider.
workflow_node.apply.form.disable_follow_: It determines whether to disable CNAME following during ACME DNS-01 challenge. If you don't understand this option, just keep it by default. Learn more.
workflow_node.apply.form.disable_ari.too: It determines whether to disable ARI (ACME Renewal Information). If you don't understand this option, just keep it by default. Learn more.
workflow_node.apply.form.skip_before_exp: If the last certificate expiration time exceeds
Be careful not to exceed the validity period limit of the issued certificate, otherwise the certificate may never be renewed.

workflow_node.deploy.form.webhook_data.g:
Supported variables:
  1. ${DOMAIN}: The primary domain of the certificate (CommonName).
  2. ${DOMAINS}: The domain list of the certificate (SubjectAltNames).
  3. ${CERTIFICATE}: The PEM format content of the certificate file.
  4. ${SERVER_CERTIFICATE}: The PEM format content of the server certificate file.
  5. ${INTERMEDIA_CERTIFICATE}: The PEM format content of the intermediate CA certificate file.
  6. ${PRIVATE_KEY}: The PEM format content of the private key file.

Please visit the authorization management page for addtional notes.
